flawed_nl_solution:
If Jessica's mother would be alive today, ten years later after her death, she would be 70, meaning she died at 70-10=<<60=60>>60
If Jessica was half her mother's age when her mother died, she was 1/2*60=120/1 years old.
Currently, ten years later, Jessica is 10+120/1=<<10+120/1=130>>130 years old.
#### 130

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 120/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
